Tvh Wizard by Tnds: Configuracao do TvHeadend 4.2 e OSCam no LibreELEC
extension.description: Tvh Wizard by Tnds (@PKG_VERSION@): Use this addon to configure TvHeadend 4.2 and OSCam only from LibreELEC interface with list of updated and organized channels (DVB-C, DVB-S "Hispasat") and the respective Picons. Create user administrator and / or client with password. Add DVBapi client

Tvh Wizard by Tnds (@PKG_VERSION@): Usa este addon para configurar o TvHeadend 4.2 e OSCam apenas a partir da Interface do LibreELEC com lista de canais actualizadas e organizadas (DVB-C, DVB-S "Hispasat") e os respectivos icons. Cria utilizador administrador e/ou cliente com password. Adiciona cliente DVBapi
